explains: n. 不公平，不公正；不正当

sentences.en: We tried to meet both children's needs without the appearance of favouritism or unfairness.
sentences.cn: 我们试图在没有偏爱或不公平的表象下满足两个孩子的需要。

sentences.en: No one ever gets over the first unfairness; no one except Peter.
sentences.cn: 没有人能克服最初的不公平；除了彼得以外。

sentences.en: She tried in vain to point out to him the unfairness of his actions.
sentences.cn: 她试图向他指出他的做法不公正，但无济于事。
